data.expected_result: GIF BG colour should be same as page like before
data.short_description: [Website Bug] GIF on intro page has wrong BG colour
data.steps_to_repro: - Sign in on the site https://discordapp(.)com/login - Head over to https://discordapp(.)com/developers/docs/intro - Observe how the GIF has now got the wrong BG colour due to the styling changes - (Side note: Someone pls fix bug bot to allow links for website bugs and to not loose edits smh)
